description: Main entry point for the Flutter application, initializing environment variables, setting up global state management with Provider, and configuring the MaterialApp with routing and theming.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, responsible for setting up the MaterialApp with theme and routing.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, initializing environment variables, widgets binding, and starting the app with global state.

methods.name: MyApp.build
methods.description: Build method that returns the MaterialApp configured with theme and routing.
